text: The product's features for the price it's offered is very competitive. It works smoothly, has all you need for office and student work (windows 11 pro and ms office 2021).The seller was also helpful and promptly helped me via anydesk when I couldn't access ms office which actually was a mistake from my end. Also, lenovo helped me get warranty months back due to some glitch as it showed 8 months left but they fixed it after asking me for invoice and pslip.Display could have been better brightness wise but no issues when using indoors on near full brightness.Total9.5/10 Read more
